allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Import-Csv ''C:\GitHub\fm26-lineup-optimizer\players-current.csv'' | Select-Object Name, ''Defensive Midfielder'', ''Best Position'', Age, CA, PA, Versatility | Sort-Object -Property @{Expression={[int]$_''Defensive Midfielder''}} -Descending | Format-Table -AutoSize")

Bash(powershell -Command "Import-Csv ''C:\GitHub\fm26-lineup-optimizer\players-current.csv'' | Where-Object { $_Name -like ''*Ababio*'' } | Select-Object Name, ''D(R/L)'', ''Best Position'', Age, CA, PA, Versatility, ''Match Sharpness'', Condition, ''Consecutive Starts'', ''Owned/Loaned'' | Format-List")

Bash(powershell -Command "Import-Csv ''C:\GitHub\fm26-lineup-optimizer\players-current.csv'' | Where-Object { [int]$_''D(R/L)'' -gt 0 } | Select-Object Name, ''D(R/L)'', ''Best Position'', Age, CA, PA, Versatility, ''Match Sharpness'', Condition, ''Consecutive Starts'', ''Owned/Loaned'' | Sort-Object -Property @{Expression={[int]$_''D(R/L)''}} -Descending | Select-Object -First 15 | Format-Table -AutoSize")
Bash(ls -la "C:\GitHub\fm26-lineup-optimizer\ui\api"" 2>/dev/null || echo "api directory may not exist or has different structure ")
